item.title: Digitalization of a logistics-oriented SME
item.description: Nowadays, no business with huge volumes of data survives without tailor-made software that suits the niche it operates in. With this in mind, a customer approached me and asked to digitize their operations. This article dives into the process of developing a whole new IT suite for a European parcel shipping company that is based in Greece.
